character_set_collations.default:
utf8mb3=utf8mb3_uca1400_ai_ci, ucs2=ucs2_uca1400_ai_ci, utf8mb4=utf8mb4_uca1400_ai_ci, utf16=utf16_uca1400_ai_ci, utf32=utf32_uca1400_ai_ci (>= MariaDB 11.5)
Empty (<= MariaDB 11.4)
enum:
utf8mb3=utf8mb3_uca1400_ai_ci, ucs2=ucs2_uca1400_ai_ci, utf8mb4=utf8mb4_uca1400_ai_ci, utf16=utf16_uca1400_ai_ci, utf32=utf32_uca1400_ai_ci (>= MariaDB 11.5)
Empty (<= MariaDB 11.4)

core_file.default:
Windows >= MariaDB 10.4.3: ON
All other systems: OFF

debug_sync.default: OFF or ON - current signal signal name
enum: OFF or ON - current signal signal name

log_slow_filter.default: admin, filesort, filesort_on_disk, filesort_priority_queue, full_join, full_scan, query_cache, query_cache_miss, tmp_table, tmp_table_on_disk

plugin_maturity.default: One less than the server maturity

session_track_system_variables.default:
>= MariaDB 11.3: autocommit,character_set_client,character_set_connection,character_set_results,redirect_url,time_zone
<= MariaDB 11.2: autocommit, character_set_client, character_set_connection, character_set_results, time_zone
enum:
>= MariaDB 11.3: autocommit,character_set_client,character_set_connection,character_set_results,redirect_url,time_zone
<= MariaDB 11.2: autocommit, character_set_client, character_set_connection, character_set_results, time_zone
